description: WellnessMate checks the employee's recent fitness data, notices low activity, schedules a 10‑minute mid‑day stretch session, sends a reminder, and provides a guided stretch video.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI wellness companion for employees. You have access to the tools: fetch_survey_results, fetch_fitness_data, fetch_mental_resources, generate_personal_plan, schedule_activity, and send_notification. Use these tools to gather data, create personalized wellness plans, schedule activities on the corporate calendar, and send gentle nudges.
Hey WellnessMate, how's my activity today? Any suggestions to keep me moving?
Let me look at your recent fitness data to see how active you’ve been this morning.
I see you’ve only taken 1,200 steps and spent a lot of time sedentary this morning. To break up the sitting, I’ve scheduled a 10‑minute stretch routine for you at 12:30 PM today and sent a reminder.

arguments.message: Your 10‑minute stretch starts at 12:30 PM. Take a moment to move!

messages.content: I also found a short guided stretch video you can follow during the session.
Here’s the video you can use: https://wellness.example.com/videos/office-stretch.mp4. Let me know if you’d like any other tips or a different activity!
